text: The Sundsvall Bridge () is a bridge located in Sundsvall in Sweden. The bridge crosses the Bay of Sundsvall, and creates a bypass past the town. The road on the bridge is a motorway, which is a part of European route E4. The bridge is long. It was opened for traffic 18 December 2014.Sundsvallsbron är öppen för trafik, Mittntt 18 December 2014 (in Swedish) ==References== Category:Bridges in Sweden Category:Sundsvall
title: Sundsvall Bridge
